div.p: HERE IT IS, YOUR MOMENT OF ZEN.
>> HALLOWEEN IS JUST OVER A WEEK AWAY, SO THERE'S STILL TIME TO FIND A GREAT COSTUME.
>> THIS IS THE DO IT YOURSELF COSTUME OF THE YEAR, NO?
LAST YEAR IT WAS THE CHILEAN MINERS.
